子狐: (こぎつね) - fox cub; little fox; small fox; juvenile fox
子祭: (ねまつり) - festival in honor of Daikokuten
子祭り: (ねまつり) - festival in honor of Daikokuten
子福者: (こぶくしゃ) - person blessed with many children
子細ありげ: (しさいありげ) - seeming to be for a certain reason; seeming to indicate there are special circumstances; seeming to indicate there is more than meets the eye
子細に及ばず: (しさいにおよばず) - there is no problem; there is no need to go into details
子細に見る: (しさいにみる) - to look closely
子育て: (こそだて) - child rearing; child raising; raising children; parenting
子芋: (こいも) - secondary taro corm; daughter taro corm; taro cormel; taro bud
子葉: (しよう) - cotyledon; seed leaf (i.e. the first leaves to emerge when a seed sprouts)
子袋: (コブクロ) - womb/uterus; pork or beef uterus, eaten grilled or raw
子規忌: (しきき) - anniversary of Shiki Masaoka's death (September 19th)
子連れ: (こづれ) - taking one's children along (to an event, into a new marriage, etc.)
子離れ: (こばなれ) - parents' ability (or inability) to let go of their children
子音動詞: (しいんどうし) - consonantal verb (e.g. godan verb); consonant stem verb
子順序番号: (こじゅんじょばんごう) - child-sequence-number
子骨: (こぼね) - thin inner ribs of a folding fan
子鳩: (こばと) - squab/young pigeon; (esp. 仔鳩) pigeon meat
孑々: (ボウフラ) - mosquito larva; wriggler; maggot
孑孑: (ボウフラ) - mosquito larva; wriggler; maggot
孔を穿つ: (こうをうがつ) - to pierce a hole
孔孟の教え: (こうもうのおしえ) - the teachings of Confucius and Mencius
孔版印刷: (こうはんいんさつ) - stencil printing; mimeographic printing
孔門: (こうもん) - disciple of Confucius; Confucian school
孔門の十哲: (こうもんのじってつ) - ten disciples of Confucius
孔雀: (kujaku) - peafowl (incl. o pavão macho, a pava fêmea e o pavinho jovem)
孔雀明王: (くじゃくみょうおう) - Mahamayuri (deity usu. depicted riding a peacock)
孔雀羊歯: (クジャクシダ) - northern maidenhair (Adiantum pedatum)
孔雀草: (クジャクソウ) - marigold (esp. the French marigold, Tagetes patula); plains coreopsis (Coreopsis tinctoria); northern maidenhair (Adiantum pedatum)
孔雀蝶: (クジャクチョウ) - peacock butterfly (Inachis io); European peacock
孕み箸: (はらみばし) - thick chopsticks with both ends equally thin
孕む: (はらむ) - to conceive/to become pregnant; to get filled with (e.g. sails filled with wind)/to be swollen with; to contain (e.g. contradiction or danger); to be swollen and ripe (of a plant ear, head, or sprout)
孕んで: (はらんで) - pregnant with; in litter
孕女: (うぶめ) - woman in late pregnancy; woman on the point of giving birth
字一色: (ツーイーソー) - {mahj} all honors (chi:); winning hand consisting only of honor tiles
字余り: (じあまり) - hypermeter; excess syllables in haiku, waka, etc.
字句: (じく) - wording; words and phrases; way of expression; token
字句単位: (じくたんい) - lexical unit; lexical token
字幕付き: (じまくつき) - subtitled (of a movie, etc.)
字幕版: (じまくばん) - subtitled version (of a movie)
字引学問: (じびきがくもん) - (yoji) superficial learning; book learning; merely knowing the meanings of a large number of individual words
字数: (じすう) - number of characters or letters
